properties.site-address: Civic And Cultural Quarter, Waterdale
properties.ownership: owned by a public authority
properties.notes: "08/02535/OUTA - This is a large mixed use Outline permission, a significant proportion has now come forward with Reserved Matters and indeed built. There is a 1ha site (Scarborough House) identified for residential uses that has not yet had Reserved Matters.  Although this site has been temporary greened over, it previosuly contained Council Offices and car parking so is considered to be Brownfield. The capacity in this register reflects this part of the scheme only. Other residential elements are under construction (see 12/02500/REMM) and the original capacity of 450 units is no longer expected to materialise with a revised total of 130 units now expected". "Mixed Use Civic & Cultural Quarter comprising new performance venue, public library, civic offices, A1/A2/A3/A4 retail, B1 offices, D2 leisure, C1 hotels and C3 residential and open space"
